name: Ravenous Reptiles
description:
Catcher or CHAMELEON? Can you eat all the tasty food before the CATCHER traps you? This exciting game puts MAN against REPTILE.
Use all your sneaky reptile skills, like changing color and slipping under cracks, to grab all the food before the men trap you! Avoid their vision, and work together by freeing your trapped chameleon companions from traps.
